page.title: 08EVENTS
page.content:
During the Summer of 1985 many events will take place including:-
{Rambles on June 5,19,July 3,17 etc. {Exhibitions of Postcards June 1 to 29 {Smile Week July 20-28 {Band Concerts June 1,9,15,23,30 etc. {Scarsdale Hospital Gala June 8 {Young Cyclist Competition June 29 {Derbyshire v. Yorkshire Schools' {Cricket Match July 7 {Morris Dancing July 13 {Teddy Bears' Picnic July 21 {Medieval Market July 23 {Evening Cycle Race around the town {centre July 26 {Barrel Organ Phil (busker) July 27 {Punch and Judy Show Aug 3 {Bank Holiday Market Aug 26 {Geoff Miller Benefit Cricket Match {Sept 14 {Exhibition of Hand-me-downs Sept 7-28
